entry.title: https://github.com/E3SM-Project/E3SM
entry.content: Energy Exascale Earth System Model source code. NOTE: use "maint" branches for your work. Head of master is not validated.

entry.title: https://github.com/ESCOMP/CTSM
entry.content: Community Terrestrial Systems Model (includes the Community Land Model of CESM)

entry.title: https://github.com/GEOS-ESM/MAPL
entry.content: MAPL is a foundation layer of the GEOS architecture, whose original purpose is to supplement the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF)

entry.title: https://github.com/MPAS-Dev/MPAS-Model
entry.content: Repository for MPAS models and shared framework releases.

entry.title: https://github.com/OpenFAST/openfast
entry.content: Main repository for the NREL-supported OpenFAST whole-turbine and FAST.Farm wind farm simulation codes.

entry.title: https://github.com/wrf-model/WRF
entry.content: The official repository for the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model
